title: Keir Starmer – 2021 Comments on a Pay Rise for NHS Workers
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 5 March 2021.
content:
During the pandemic it’s been our amazing NHS who’ve kept our country going, kept us safe, and looked after our loved ones.
